attributes.action: Do more things against youth discrimination...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I personally beleive that teenagers (like me)are being discriminated against because we have not got many legal rights . If someone was to discriminate an ethnic minority it would result in prosicution on the count of racism. To do this we should  set guidlines for the media and also ban the usage of devices known as mosquetto's.
